trans-unit.source: Specifies how an accessible object is selected or receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 指定选择辅助性对象的方式或该对象接收焦点的方式。

trans-unit.source: A focused object is the one object that receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: 已设定焦点的对象是接收键盘输入的一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The object with the keyboard focus is either the active window or a child object of the active window.
trans-unit.target: 具有键盘焦点的对象是活动窗口或活动窗口的子对象。

trans-unit.source: A selected object is marked to participate in some type of group operation.
trans-unit.target: 所选的对象被标记为参与某种类型的组操作。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Select%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Select%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For additional information on the accessibility application, search for "Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) library.
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助功能应用程序的其他信息，搜索"Microsoft Active Accessibility"Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) 库中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes to expose accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>类来公开可访问的信息。

trans-unit.source: The control plots two curves along with a legend.
trans-unit.target: 该控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。

trans-unit.source: The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control.
trans-unit.target: `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法以提供为图表控件的自定义可访问的信息。

trans-unit.source: Because the chart legend is not an actual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 因为图表图例不是实际<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>-基于控制，但改为绘制图表控件中，通过它不提供任何内置的可访问信息。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A>方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示将图例的每个部分的访问信息。

trans-unit.source: When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 当辅助功能的应用程序使用此控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection> enumeration with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection>枚举<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>完整的代码示例的类概述。

trans-unit.source: Adds the object to the selection.
trans-unit.target: 将对象添至所选内容。

trans-unit.source: Selects all objects between the anchor and the selected object.
trans-unit.target: 选择定位点和选定对象件之间的所有对象。

trans-unit.source: The selection or focus of an object is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 对象的选择或焦点不更改。

trans-unit.source: Removes the object from the selection.
trans-unit.target: 从所选内容中移除对象。

trans-unit.source: Assigns focus to an object and makes it the anchor, which is the starting point for the selection.
trans-unit.target: 将焦点分配到对象并使其作为定位点，即选择的起始点。

trans-unit.source: Can be combined with <see langword="TakeSelection" />, <see langword="ExtendSelection" />, <see langword="AddSelection" />, or <see langword="RemoveSelection" />.
trans-unit.target: 可与 <see langword="TakeSelection" />、<see langword="ExtendSelection" />、<see langword="AddSelection" /> 或 <see langword="RemoveSelection" /> 结合使用。

trans-unit.source: Selects the object and deselects all other objects in the container.
trans-unit.target: 选择该对象并取消对容器内所有其他对象的选择。
